SQL.statement: CREATE TABLESPACE grape MANAGED BY automatic storage
CREATE LARGE TABLESPACE fan MANAGED BY automatic storage
CREATE TABLE ABCMXYZ( A INT, B DOUBLE, C char(10), D int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ABCMXYZ ON ABCMXYZ (A DeSC)
CREATE TABLE ABC_XYZ( A INT, B DOUBLE, C char(10), D int) IN grape Index in fan
Alter table ABC_XYZ Data Capture Changes include Longvar columns
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ABC_XYZ ON ABC_XYZ (A)
CREATE TABLE ABCMMM( A INT, B DOUBLE, C char(10), D int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ABCMMM ON ABCMMM (A)
CREATE TABLE "abc_xyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "d" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "abc_xyz" ON "abc_xyz" ("a")
CREATE TABLE "Abc_Xyz"( "A" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "D" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "Abc_Xyz" ON "Abc_Xyz" ("A")
CREATE TABLE "abcmxyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "d" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "abcmxyz" ON "abcmxyz" ("a")
CREATE TABLE "abcMxyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "D" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX tower11 on "abcMxyz" ("a", D)
CREATE TABLE "abc.xyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "d" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "abc.xyz" ON "abc.xyz" ("a", "d")
CREATE TABLE "abc%xyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "d" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "abc%xyz" ON "abc%xyz" ("a", "d")
CREATE TABLE UPPER.ABCMXYZ( A INT, B DOUBLE, C char(10), D int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UPPERABCMXYZ ON UPPER.ABCMXYZ (A DeSC)
CREATE TABLE UPPER.ABC_XYZ( A INT, B DOUBLE, C char(10), D int) IN grape Index in fan
Alter table UPPER.ABC_XYZ Data Capture Changes include Longvar columns
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UPPERABC_XYZ ON UPPER.ABC_XYZ (A)
CREATE TABLE UPPER.ABCMMM( A INT, B DOUBLE, C char(10), D int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UPPERABCMMM ON UPPER.ABCMMM (A)
CREATE TABLE "lower"."abc_xyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "d" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "lowerabc_xyz" ON "lower"."abc_xyz" ("a")
CREATE TABLE "Mixed"."Abc_Xyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "C" char(10), "D" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "MixedAbc_Xyz" ON "Mixed"."Abc_Xyz" ("a")
CREATE TABLE "lower"."abcmxyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "d" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "lowerabcmxyz" ON "lower"."abcmxyz" ("a")
CREATE TABLE "miXed"."abcMxyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "D" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX mixedtower11 on "miXed"."abcMxyz" ("a", D)
CREATE TABLE "dot.dot"."abc.xyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "d" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression

CREATE TABLE "Per%cent"."abc%xyz"( "a" INT, "b" DOUBLE, "c" char(10), "d" int) IN grape Index in fan value compression
